# bis557

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/tqchen07/bis557.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/tqchen07/bis557)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/tqchen07/bis557/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/tqchen07/bis557?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bis557 is to illustrate how to create an R package for the Yale Biostatistics bis 557 class.

## Installation

The development version of the package can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tqchen07/bis557")
```
